metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0644 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Push Notifications for WordPress by PushAssist WordPress plugin through3.0.8 does not sanitise and escape various parameters before outputtingthem back in pages, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which couldbe used against high privilege users such as admin.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
